page.title: 12SCHOOL MEALS
page.content:
AT MIDDAY WE HAVE LUNCHES. SOME CHILDREN BRING PACKED LUNCHES, OTHERS HAVE SCHOOL MEALS. THESE COME FROM WEST LINTON KITCHEN. WE HAVE MILK AT PLAYTIME AND SELL CRISPS FOR 12 PENCE. THE SCHOOL MEAL IS ONE COURCE AND COSTS 47 PENCE. SOMETIMES WE HAVE A CHOICE. HERE IS ONE WEEK'S MENU. MON: FISH CAKES OR CHICKEN & HAM ROLL TUE: CHEESE & EGG SALAD WITH BAKED POTATOES OR BEEF CURRY & RICE WED: SHEPHERD'S PIE AND BEANS THU: RAVIOLI, PEAS & CHIPS OR CHOPPED PORK FRI: BEEFBURGER, GRAVY, CARROTS & MASHED POTATOES
THE MOST POPULAR COURSE IS BEEFBURGER, SALAD & CHIPS. ABOUT A QUATER OF OUR CHILDREN HAVE THESE MEALS SERVED BY OUR MEALS SERVER WHO WORKS 7 AND A HALF HOURS EACH WEEK.
